titles: The Mourning court, or, The Solemn representation of the royal funeral of that most illustrious Princess Mar[y], late Queen of England, Scotland, France, and Ireland, &c. who changed this earthly crown for a more glorious and celestial diadem on the 28th of December, 1694, and was interred in King Hen[ry's] chappel at Westminster, on the 5th of March 1695 ...
notes: Imperfect: stained, cropped, and torn, with loss of print; bracketed material supplied from Wing.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
keywords: Mary --  II, --  Queen of England, 1662-1694 --  Death and burial.
